verses.name: Ezra 9:9
verses.text: For we were bondmen; yet our God hath not forsaken us in our bondage, but hath extended mercy unto us in the sight of the kings of Persia, to give us a reviving, to set up the house of our God, and to repair the desolations thereof, and to give us a wall in Judah and in Jerusalem.

verses.name: Ezra 9:10
verses.text: And now, O our God, what shall we say after this? for we have forsaken thy commandments,
